Actions: Knowledge Gap: Map lateral barriers and barrier ownership

Actions: Knowledge Gap: Develop a framework to assess and prioritize between different lateral barrier remediation projects
Details: CWF is leading a provincial-scale analysis of the effect of rail lines on connectivity for Anadromous Salmonids, as part of this project lateral habitat and barrier assessments and prioritization methods will be developed.
